description.p: OSU AIMS Lab - Physical Environment Configuration
This package contains configuration data and launch files for the physical environment in the AIMS Lab @ Ohio State.
All urdfs are based on emperically measured locations provided by acbuynak and hansen95.

Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model(s) and configuration you intend to use them with.
